author: suchandradutta
body: The validation suite has been updated to have the possibility to check Digis for the outer tracker as well as inner pixel detectors. The validation modules can be configured for one type of Digi (PixelDigi/Phase2TrackerDigi) at a time. README file has been updated accordingly. The plots can be checked from the last presentation (https://indico.cern.ch/event/548615/contributions/2245624/attachments/1310901/1961706/DigiStudy_Status_July18_2016.pdf)
title: Digi validation suite updated
